summary: Martinique is an island in the Caribbean Sea, part of the French West Indies. It's an overseas region of France, meaning it's like a piece of France located far away. The island has its own unique language, Martinican Creole, along with French. With a population of over 349,000, it's one of the Windward Islands, situated between Saint Lucia and Barbados. Martinique uses the euro as its currency and is part of the European Union.
title: Martinique
